responseText: Look, friend, I could have gone out myself. I know not all of those outlaws are idiots or thieves. Some of them are just more interested in going it alone. Renegades, if you will, weeds amongst the wildflowers! It's sort of romantic isn't it? Far too exciting for me though, I'm sure, though sometimes I think that maybe?
name: SQ_Lionhold_0002_Fragments_Carole_3_Response
